sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Badges() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all'); const [selectedBadge, setSelectedBadge] = useState(null); const userStats = { totalBadges: 24, rareBadges: 8, epicBadges: 3, legendaryBadges: 1, bridgeProBadges: 5 }; const freemiumBadges = [ { id: 1, name: 'Daily Warrior', description: 'Login for 7 consecutive days', icon: '🗡️', rarity: 'common', category: 'daily', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-15', progress: 7, maxProgress: 7, xp: 100, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #4ade80 0%, #22c55e 100%)' }, { id: 2, name: 'Streak Master', description: 'Maintain a 30-day login streak', icon: '🔥', rarity: 'rare', category: 'daily', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-10', progress: 30, maxProgress: 30, xp: 500, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f59e0b 0%, #d97706 100%)' }, { id: 3, name: 'Task Crusher', description: 'Complete 50 daily tasks', icon: '⚡', rarity: 'common', category: 'tasks', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-12', progress: 50, maxProgress: 50, xp: 250, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6 0%, #1d4ed8 100%)' }, { id: 4, name: 'Game Champion', description: 'Win 25 games across all platforms', icon: '🏆', rarity: 'epic', category: 'games', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-08', progress: 25, maxProgress: 25, xp: 750, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #8b5cf6 0%, #7c3aed 100%)' }, { id: 5, name: 'Hackathon Hero', description: 'Participate in 5 hackathons', icon: '💻', rarity: 'rare', category: 'hackathons', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-05', progress: 5, maxProgress: 5, xp: 600, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #06b6d4 0%, #0891b2 100%)' }, { id: 6, name: 'Code Ninja', description: 'Solve 100 coding problems', icon: '🥷', rarity: 'epic', category: 'competitions', earned: false, progress: 73, maxProgress: 100, xp: 1000, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #ef4444 0%, #dc2626 100%)' }, { id: 7, name: 'Learning Enthusiast', description: 'Complete 10 courses', icon: '📚', rarity: 'common', category: 'learning', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-14', progress: 10, maxProgress: 10, xp: 300, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%)' }, { id: 8, name: 'Social Butterfly', description: 'Connect with 20 mentors', icon: '🦋', rarity: 'rare', category: 'social', earned: false, progress: 12, maxProgress: 20, xp: 400, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #ec4899 0%, #db2777 100%)' } ]; const proBadges = [ { id: 101, name: 'BriDGe Elite', description: 'Exclusive Pro member badge', icon: '👑', rarity: 'legendary', category: 'pro', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-01', progress: 1, maxProgress: 1, xp: 2000, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #fbbf24 0%, #f59e0b 50%, #d97706 100%)', isPro: true, perks: ['Priority Support', 'Exclusive Events', 'Advanced Analytics'] }, { id: 102, name: 'AI Whisperer', description: 'Master AI-powered features', icon: '🤖', rarity: 'epic', category: 'pro', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-03', progress: 1, maxProgress: 1, xp: 1500, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #6366f1 0%, #4f46e5 50%, #4338ca 100%)', isPro: true, perks: ['AI Career Guidance', 'Smart Recommendations', 'Personalized Learning'] }, { id: 103, name: 'Mentor Magnet', description: 'Connect with 50+ premium mentors', icon: '🧲', rarity: 'epic', category: 'pro', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-06', progress: 52, maxProgress: 50, xp: 1200, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #14b8a6 0%, #0d9488 50%, #0f766e 100%)', isPro: true, perks: ['1-on-1 Sessions', 'Group Mentoring', 'Industry Experts'] }, { id: 104, name: 'Innovation Pioneer', description: 'Lead 3 successful projects', icon: '🚀', rarity: 'legendary', category: 'pro', earned: false, progress: 2, maxProgress: 3, xp: 2500, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f97316 0%, #ea580c 50%, #c2410c 100%)', isPro: true, perks: ['Project Showcase', 'Investor Connect', 'Startup Credits'] }, { id: 105, name: 'Global Networker', description: 'Build international connections', icon: '🌍', rarity: 'rare', category: 'pro', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-10-09', progress: 1, maxProgress: 1, xp: 800, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #0ea5e9 0%, #0284c7 50%, #0369a1 100%)', isPro: true, perks: ['Global Events', 'Cross-border Opportunities', 'Cultural Exchange'] } ]; const specialBadges = [ { id: 201, name: 'Founding Member', description: 'One of the first 1000 BriDGe users', icon: '⭐', rarity: 'legendary', category: 'special', earned: true, earnedDate: '2024-09-15', progress: 1, maxProgress: 1, xp: 5000, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #a855f7 0%, #9333ea 25%, #7c3aed 50%, #6d28d9 75%, #5b21b6 100%)', isSpecial: true, perks: ['Lifetime Recognition', 'Exclusive Community', 'Beta Access'] }, { id: 202, name: 'Community Leader', description: 'Help 100+ students succeed', icon: '🎖️', rarity: 'legendary', category: 'special', earned: false, progress: 67, maxProgress: 100, xp: 3000, background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #dc2626 0%, #b91c1c 25%, #991b1b 50%, #7f1d1d 75%, #450a0a 100%)', isSpecial: true, perks: ['Leadership Recognition', 'Mentoring Opportunities', 'Community Events'] } ]; const allBadges = [...freemiumBadges, ...proBadges, ...specialBadges]; const filteredBadges = () => { switch(activeTab) { case 'earned': return allBadges.filter(badge => badge.earned); case 'pro': return proBadges; case 'special': return specialBadges; default: return allBadges; } }; const getRarityColor = (rarity) => { switch(rarity) { case 'common': return '#10b981'; case 'rare': return '#3b82f6'; case 'epic': return '#8b5cf6'; case 'legendary': return '#f59e0b'; default: return '#6b7280'; } }; const getRarityGlow = (rarity) => { switch(rarity) { case 'common': return '0 0 20px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.5)'; case 'rare': return '0 0 25px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.6)'; case 'epic': return '0 0 30px rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.7)'; case 'legendary': return '0 0 35px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8)'; default: return 'none'; } }; return (
{/* Animated Background */}
🏆
⭐
🎖️
👑
🚀
💎
{/* Hero Section */}

Badge Collection

Showcase your achievements and unlock exclusive rewards

{/* User Stats */}
🏅
{userStats.totalBadges}
Total Badges
💎
{userStats.rareBadges}
Rare Badges
⚡
{userStats.epicBadges}
Epic Badges
👑
{userStats.legendaryBadges}
Legendary
{/* Filter Tabs */}
{/* Badges Grid */}
{filteredBadges().map((badge, index) => (
setSelectedBadge(badge)} style={{ animationDelay: `${index * 0.1}s`, boxShadow: badge.earned ? getRarityGlow(badge.rarity) : 'none' }} >
{badge.isPro &&
PRO
} {badge.isSpecial &&
SPECIAL
}
{badge.rarity.toUpperCase()}
{badge.icon}
{!badge.earned &&
🔒
}

{badge.name}

{badge.description}

{!badge.earned && (
{badge.progress}/{badge.maxProgress}
)} {badge.earned && (
Earned: {new Date(badge.earnedDate).toLocaleDateString()} +{badge.xp} XP
)}
))}
{/* Badge Details Modal */} {selectedBadge && (
setSelectedBadge(null)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>
{selectedBadge.icon}

{selectedBadge.name}

{selectedBadge.rarity.toUpperCase()} BADGE

{selectedBadge.description}

{selectedBadge.perks && (

🎁 Exclusive Perks:

    {selectedBadge.perks.map((perk, index) => (
  • {perk}
    • ))}
)}
XP Reward: +{selectedBadge.xp}
{selectedBadge.earned && (
Earned: {new Date(selectedBadge.earnedDate).toLocaleDateString()}
)}
{!selectedBadge.earned && (

Progress:

{selectedBadge.progress} / {selectedBadge.maxProgress}
)}
)} {/* Pro Upgrade Section */}

🚀 Unlock BriDGe Pro Badges

Get exclusive badges and premium perks

👑 Exclusive Pro Badges
⚡ Faster Badge Progression
🎯 Priority Support
🌟 Special Recognition
); } export default Badges;
